text: 20:4 Aposel 19:29; 21:29; Efesus 6:21Pol zuima, Berian gumazim, Sopater, a Pirusɨn otarim, an gɨn zui. Ezɨ Aristarkus koma Sekundus, aning Tesalonikan gumazimning. Ezɨ Gaius, nguibar ekiam Derben gumazim. Ezɨ Timoti ko Esian gumazir pumuning, Tikikus koma Trofimus, aning Provins Esian gumazimning, me bar moghɨra Pol ko ghue.
